job_description: Design and develop machine learning models to solve real-world problems. Implement algorithms for classification, regression, and clustering using Python and Scikit-learn.
Build and train deep neural networks for image recognition, object detection, and time-series forecasting using TensorFlow and PyTorch.
Work on Natural Language Processing projects including text classification, sentiment analysis, and named entity recognition. Use tools like spaCy, Hugging Face Transformers, and NLTK.
Conduct research in deep learning and NLP, publish findings, and implement experimental models for large-scale datasets.
Assist in developing supervised and unsupervised learning models. Perform data preprocessing and model evaluation using real-world datasets.
Apply deep learning techniques to image and video data. Build models for object detection, segmentation, and face recognition using CNNs.
Analyze and process large text corpora. Build NLP pipelines for document classification, topic modeling, and information extraction.
Develop end-to-end ML pipelines, tune models for performance, and deploy predictive systems in production environments.
